tag.description: Renders a javascript block to be performed after remove a row
tag.name: formGroupMultipleOnAfterRemove
tag.example:
<html:form action="#" label="My title">
<html:formGroupMultiple label="Fields group"> <html:formGroupMultipleOnAfterRemove> /* function signature is f():void */
</html:formGroupMultipleOnAfterRemove> <html:input name="fields3[]"/> </html:formGroupMultiple> <html:formToolbar> <html:button state="primary" type="submit" label="Label for submit"/> </html:formToolbar> </html:form>

tag.description: Renders a javascript block to be performed after insert a new row
tag.name: formGroupMultipleOnAfterInsert
tag.example: <html:form action="#" label="My title"> <html:formGroupMultiple label="Fields group"> <html:formGroupMultipleOnAfterInsert> /* function signature is f(idx,element):void. idx: index of line was added, element: clone of elements declared in template */ console.log(idx); console.log(element); </html:formGroupMultipleOnAfterInsert> <html:input name="fields3[]"/> </html:formGroupMultiple> <html:formToolbar> <html:button state="primary" type="submit" label="Label for submit"/> </html:formToolbar> </html:form>

tag.name: formOnBeforeSubmit
tag.example: <html:form action="#" label="My title"> <html:formOnBeforeSubmit> /* function signature is f():boolean (true to continue submit and false to cancel submit) */ return true; </html:formOnBeforeSubmit> <html:formToolbar> <html:button state="primary" type="submit" label="Label for submit"/> </html:formToolbar> </html:form>

tag.name: form

attribute.description: Indicates the action of submission
attribute.name: action

attribute.description: It indicates if component has border. Default true
attribute.name: border

attribute.description: It indicates a css class to the component
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: It indicates form to be inline. Default false
attribute.name: inline

attribute.description: Indicates the label of the form
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the localize (i18n) label key of the form
attribute.name: labelKey

attribute.description: Indicates the target of submission. Default : _self. Options : _blank,_self,_parent,_top,iframe
attribute.name: target

attribute.description: It indicates the method to be used. Default: post. Options: post, get
attribute.name: method

attribute.description: Indicates the name of form
attribute.name: name

attribute.description: It indicates a validation to be performed on the data form
attribute.name: validation

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: It indicates whether the form should have file support
attribute.name: multipart

attribute.description: Indicates the id for the component
attribute.name: id

tag.example: <html:form action="#" label="My title"> <html:formGroup label="Field 1" required="true"> <html:input required="true" name="field1"/> </html:formGroup> <html:formGroup label="Field 2"> <html:input name="field2"/> </html:formGroup> <html:formGroupMultiple label="Fields group"> <html:input name="fields3[]"/> </html:formGroupMultiple> <html:formToolbar> <html:button state="primary" type="submit" label="Label for submit"/> </html:formToolbar> </html:form>

tag.description: Renders a form footer on the form component
tag.name: formToolbar

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered

tag.example: <html:form action="#" label="My title"> <html:formGroup label="Field 1" required="true"> <html:input required="true" name="field1"/> </html:formGroup> <html:formGroup label="Field 2"> <html:input name="field2"/> </html:formGroup> <html:formGroupMultiple label="Fields group"> <html:input name="fields3[]"/> </html:formGroupMultiple> <html:formToolbar> <html:button state="primary" type="submit" label="Label for submit"/> </html:formToolbar> </html:form>

tag.description: Renders a component grouping in the form
tag.name: formGroup

attribute.description: Indicates the label of the group
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the label key (18n) of the group
attribute.name: labelKey

attribute.description: Indicates the id of the group
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: It indicates the element to be oriented the label
attribute.name: forElement

attribute.description: Indicates whether the completion of the internal component should be mandatory
attribute.name: required

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be visible
attribute.name: visible

tag.example: <html:form action="#" label="My title"> <html:formGroup label="Field 1" required="true"> <html:input required="true" name="field1"/> </html:formGroup> <html:formGroup label="Field 2"> <html:input name="field2"/> </html:formGroup> <html:formGroupMultiple label="Fields group"> <html:input name="fields3[]"/> </html:formGroupMultiple> <html:formToolbar> <html:button state="primary" type="submit" label="Label for submit"/> </html:formToolbar> </html:form>

tag.name: formGroupMultiple

attribute.description: Indicates the label component
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the label key (i18n) component
attribute.name: labelKey

attribute.description: Indicates the collection to be iterated in component
attribute.name: data

attribute.description: It indicates the name of the variable java to be made available the object of iteration
attribute.name: var

attribute.description: It indicates the name of the variable java (com.jslsolucoes.tagria.tag.html.v4.tag.VarStatus) to be made available the index of iteration.
attribute.name: varStatus

attribute.description: Indicates the minimum number of lines to be filled
attribute.name: atLeast

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should start without lines
attribute.name: empty

tag.example: <html:form action="#" label="My title"> <html:formGroup label="Field 1" required="true"> <html:input required="true" name="field1"/> </html:formGroup> <html:formGroup label="Field 2"> <html:input name="field2"/> </html:formGroup> <html:formGroupMultiple label="Fields group"> <html:input name="fields3[]"/> </html:formGroupMultiple> <html:formToolbar> <html:button state="primary" type="submit" label="Label for submit"/> </html:formToolbar> </html:form>
